Html:
Hi

Is there a way in the control to just redraw the overlays and not the whole map. My application is tracking GPS positions and the map hardly moves and it would be nice to be able to refresh the position with out haveing to redraw the whole map.

Also is there a option for text top be displayed while the Map tile is being downloaded?

 

Thanks

 

Colin
in wpfversion it's done automaticaly, in win forms version,  after position changed, call public void UpdateMarkerLocalPosition(GMapMarker marker)

Hi

 

I have tried that but it doesnt actully move the position until you click in the map then it icon moves.

 

Colin

Hi

 

I found the problem if you add <font size="2" color="#0000ff"><font size="2" color="#0000ff">

base

</font></font><font size="2" color="#0000ff">

 

</font>

.Refresh();

to the end of the procedure it works :)

no need of that in current version
